/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is teeming with vehicles, including a red truck and a white truck, adding a splash of color to the otherwise gray day. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the background, you can see trees lining the road, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life and movement in this part of the world.
